BetterBeginnings:Brute.NAME: Brute
BetterBeginnings:Brute.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! Strength. NL Exhaust.

BetterBeginnings:Cowardice.NAME: Cowardice
BetterBeginnings:Cowardice.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add a *Dazed to your draw pile and hand.

BetterBeginnings:DataRecovery.NAME: Data Recovery
BetterBeginnings:DataRecovery.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Shuffle !M! cards from your discard pile into your draw pile.

BetterBeginnings:Piety.NAME: Piety
BetterBeginnings:Piety.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Mantra.

BetterBeginnings:Plague.NAME: Plague
BetterBeginnings:Plague.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! Poison to ALL enemies.

BetterBeginnings:StabAndStrike.NAME: Stab And Strike
BetterBeginnings:StabAndStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add a *Shiv to your hand.
